mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IBOARD( IBOARD_NO, IBOARD_TITLE, IBOARD_CONTENT, IBOARD_WRITER, PROJECT_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_IBOARD.NEXTVAL, #{iboardTitle}, #{iboardContent}, #{iboardWriter}, #{projectNo} )

INSERT INTO IATTACHMENT( IATTACHMENT_NO, IBOARD_NO, IATTACHMENT_ORIGIN, IATTACHMENT_PATH, IATTACHMENT_CHANGE, IATTACHMENT_LEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_IATTACHMENT.NEXTVAL, SEQ_IBOARD.CURRVAL, #{iAttachmentOrigin}, #{iAttachmentPath}, #{iAttachmentChange}, #{iAttachmentLevel} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IBOARD WHERE IBOARD_DELETE IS NULL

SELECT IBOARD_NO, IBOARD_TITLE, PROJECT_NO, IBOARD_VIEWS, IBOARD_CONTENT, M.MEMBER_NAME AS "IBOARD_WRITER", PROJECT_NO, TO_CHAR(I.IBOARD_INSERT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "IBOARD_INSERT", IBOARD_VIEWS FROM IBOARD I, MEMBER M WHERE I.IBOARD_WRITER = M.MEMBER_NO AND IBOARD_DELETE IS NULL ORDER BY IBOARD_NO DESC

SELECT IATTACHMENT_NO, IBOARD_NO, IATTACHMENT_ORIGIN, IATTACHMENT_CHANGE, IATTACHMENT_PATH, IATTACHMENT_INSERT, IATTACHMENT_LEVEL FROM IATTACHMENT WHERE IBOARD_NO = #{iboardNo} AND IATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 0

SELECT PROJECT_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME AS "PROJECT_OWNER", RECRUITMENT_NO, PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_INFO, PROJECT_INSERT, PROJECT_START, PROJECT_END, PROJECT_LOCATION, PROJECT_READY FROM PROJECT P, MEMBER M WHERE PROJECT_READY = 2 AND P.PROJECT_OWNER = M.MEMBER_NO AND P.PROJECT_OWNER = #{memberNo}
SELECT * FROM RECRUITMENT R, PROJECT P WHERE P.RECRUITMENT_NO = R.RECRUITMENT_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE IBOARD SET IBOARD_VIEWS = IBOARD_VIEWS + 1 WHERE IBOARD_NO = #{iboardNo} AND IBOARD_DELETE IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT P.RECRUITMENT_NO, T.TAGS_NAME AS "TAGS_NO" FROM TAGS T, PRELATION PR, IBOARD I, PROJECT P WHERE I.PROJECT_NO = P.PROJECT_NO AND P.RECRUITMENT_NO = PR.RECRUITMENT_NO AND PR.TAGS_NO = T.TAGS_NO AND P.RECRUITMENT_NO = #{recruitmentNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE IBOARD SET IBOARD_VIEWS = IBOARD_VIEWS + 1 WHERE IBOARD_NO = #{ino} AND IBOARD_DELETE IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT I.IBOARD_NO, I.IBOARD_TITLE, I.IBOARD_CONTENT, I.IBOARD_INSERT, I.IBOARD_VIEWS, M.MEMBER_NAME AS "IBOARD_WRITER" FROM IBOARD I, MEMBER M WHERE I.IBOARD_WRITER = M.MEMBER_NO AND IBOARD_NO = #{ino} AND IBOARD_DELETE IS NULL

SELECT I.IREPLY_NO AS "IREPLY_NO" , M.MEMBER_NO AS "MEMBER_NO" , M.MEMBER_NAME AS "MEMBER_NAME" , I.IREPLY_CONTENT AS "IREPLY_CONTENT" , TO_CHAR(I.IREPLY_INSERT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "IREPLY_INSERT" FROM IREPLY I, MEMBER M WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = I.MEMBER_NO AND I.IREPLY_DELETE IS NULL AND I.IBOARD_NO = #{iboardNo} ORDER BY I.IREPLY_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE IREPLY SET IREPLY_CONTENT = #{ireplyContent}, IREPLY_INSERT = SYSDATE WHERE IREPLY_NO = #{ireplyNo}
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, B.* FROM (SELECT IBOARD_NO , IBOARD_TITLE , IBOARD_WRITER , IBOARD_VIEWS , TO_CHAR(IBOARD_INSERT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "IBOARD_INSERT" FROM IBOARD WHERE IBOARD_DELETE IS NULL ORDER BY COUNT DESC) B WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT RECRUITMENT_NO, RECRUITMENT_TITLE, RECRUITMENT_CONTENT, MEMBER_NAME AS "RECRUITMENT_WRITER", RECRUITMENT_INSERT, RECRUITMENT_VIEWS, TO_CHAR(R.RECRUITMENT_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "RECRUITMENT_START", TO_CHAR(R.RECRUITMENT_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "RECRUITMENT_END", RECRUITMENT_LOCATION, RECRUITMENT_INTRO FROM RECRUITMENT R, MEMBER M WHERE R.RECRUITMENT_WRITER = M.MEMBER_NO AND RECRUITMENT_NO = #{projectno} AND RECRUITMENT_DELETE IS NULL
SELECT PR.RECRUITMENT_NO, T.TAGS_NAME AS "TAGS_NO" FROM PRELATION PR, TAGS T WHERE PR.TAGS_NO = T.TAGS_NO AND PR.RECRUITMENT_NO=#{recruitmentNo}

SELECT RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_NO, RECRUITMENT_NO, RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_ORIGIN, RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_CHANGE, RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_PATH, RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_INSERT, RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_LEVEL FROM RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT WHERE RECRUITMENT_NO=#{recruitmentNo} AND RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 0
SELECT * FROM RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT WHERE RECRUITMENT_NO=#{recruitmentNo} AND RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_LEVEL=1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT IBOARD_NO, IATTACHMENT_PATH, IATTACHMENT_CHANGE FROM IATTACHMENT ORDER BY IATTACHMENT_INSERT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT IATTACHMENT_NO, IBOARD_NO, IATTACHMENT_ORIGIN, IATTACHMENT_CHANGE, IATTACHMENT_PATH, IATTACHMENT_INSERT, IATTACHMENT_LEVEL FROM IATTACHMENT WHERE IBOARD_NO = #{iboardNo} AND IATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IATTACHMENT(IATTACHMENT_NO, IBOARD_NO, IATTACHMENT_ORIGIN, IATTACHMENT_CHANGE, IATTACHMENT_PATH, IATTACHMENT_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_IATTACHMENT.NEXTVAL, SEQ_IBOARD.CURRVAL, #{iAttachmentOrigin}, #{iAttachmentChange}, #{iAttachmentPath}, #{iAttachmentLevel})
mapper.select: SELECT P.RECRUITMENT_NO, P.PROJECT_NAME, P.PROJECT_START, P.PROJECT_END FROM PROJECT P, IBOARD I WHERE P.PROJECT_NO = I.PROJECT_NO AND PROJECT_READY = 3 AND P.PROJECT_NO = #{projectNo}
SELECT * FROM IATTACHMENT WHERE IBOARD_NO = #{iboardNo} AND IATTACHMENT_LEVEL=1
SELECT * FROM RECRUITMENT R, PROJECT P, IBOARD I WHERE P.RECRUITMENT_NO = R.RECRUITMENT_NO AND P.PROJECT_NO = I.PROJECT_NO AND I.IBOARD_NO = #{iboardNo}
